CustomField.description: Used to hold a campaign partner member's related e-signature filed packet that is related to a client with the Power of Attorney (POA) format. This works in conjunction with automation that pulls files into the button to create e-sig file to send off to clients.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Standard file for Signer with Power of Attorney (POA). See variation for unique circumstances for Partner firms.
CustomField.label: Standard E-Sig Packet (POA)
